creator: deeptish.proffessional@gmail.com
text:
1. Perform some test that display a graph in Aggregate Graph
2. Click on Clear All option
3. Check the previously displayed graph(during point no 1 above)

Defect is the previously displayed graph is not being cleared.

URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1531330
Log:
"Clear All" for Aggregate Graph is not clearing the last run Graph
Not a real fix, but improves the user experience
Bugzilla Id: 55564

Modified:
    jmeter/trunk/src/components/org/apache/jmeter/visualizers/RespTimeGraphVisualizer.java
creator: milamber@apache.org
